message:
SYSTEM: Ontologies-Methodology.pdf: Página 29
29
Ontology Requirements Specification. Task 5
 Input: the list of CQs
 Objective: obtaining different groups of CQs
 Techniques: Card Sorting, when the grouping is 
done manually, and Clustering NL sentences or 
Information Extraction when the grouping is done 
automatically
 Tools: MindMap
Tools or Cicero Tool (for 
distributed teams)
 Output: a set of groups including CQs
 Hybrid approach:

The analysis of the frequency of terms and the 
grouping of CQs based on those terms that have a 
higher frequency. 

The use of pre-established categories, such as time 
and date, units of measure, currencies, location, 
languages, etc.
speaker: SYSTEM
